author: topix.com
title: Miss Marple will be much younger in the forthcoming US reboot by Spooks creator - Mid Devon Star
text:
There are 1 comment on the Mid Devon Star story from 14 hrs ago, titled Miss Marple will be much younger in the forthcoming US reboot by Spooks creator . In it, Mid Devon Star reports that:
For starters, she'll be much younger in this new series than she is in the famous books or previous TV adaptations. According to Variety, the Agatha Christie estate is involved in the remake, with grandson Matthew Prichard and Hilary Strong of Agatha Christie Ltd in producing roles.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Mid Devon Star.
